title: Java StringtoLowerCase()Method

metadata.description: Learn about Java StringtoLowerCase()Method with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Convert a string to upper case and lower case letters:
String txt = "Hello World";
System.out.println(txt.toUpperCase());
System.out.println(txt.toLowerCase());

Definition and Usage
The
toLowerCase()
method converts a string to lower case letters.
Note:
The
toUpperCase()
method converts a string to upper case letters.
Syntax
public String toLowerCase()
Parameters
None.
Technical Details
Returns:
A
String
value, representing the new string converted to lower case

★
+1
